control_attributes.control_description: The organization correlates the output from vulnerability scanning tools to determine the presence of multi-vulnerability/multi-hop attack vectors.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to provide a description of the functional properties of the security controls to be employed.

Control Statement: The organization correlates the output from vulnerability scanning tools to determine the presence of multi-vulnerability/multi-hop attack vectors.
